content.p: MEASAT Publications Internship Description: MEASAT Publications Sdn Bhd is a progressive publisher of consumer magazines. Our stable of eight titles complements the ASTRO service and addreses the group’s mision of offering comprehensive content experiences. Since its inception in 2002, MEASAT Publications has grown from strength to strength to become among the top publishers in Malaysia. It continues to forge links with international publishing houses in its quest to bring quality and compelling reads into the Malaysian market. MEASAT Publications is one of Malaysia’s most dynamic publishing houses. With a well-balanced stable of titles in Malay, Chinese and English, MEASAT Publications handles all aspects of publishing from content creation to marketing and distribution. MEASAT Publications titles include: How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form here. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
